text:
「ぁ……へい、き……んッ」
千の指が無遠慮に窄まりを抉っていく。 尻の穴を拡げられる感覚は指ぐらいではさして感じないが、それでも異物感が拭えない。 バスタブの縁に腰かけて膝を開いた体勢のまま、百はぎゅっと目を瞑ってその違和感に耐えようとした。 やがて挿入する指を二本に増やし中を拡張させると、片方の手で持っていたシャワーヘッドを再び股間に当てる。
trans:
"Ah... I'm fine... ngh."
Sen's fingers unceremoniously probed the constriction. The sensation of having his asshole stretched wasn't particularly pronounced with just fingers, yet the sense of foreignness couldn't be shaken. Sitting on the edge of the bathtub with his knees spread, Hyaku tightly shut his eyes, trying to endure the discomfort. Gradually, as the number of inserted fingers increased to two and his insides were stretched further, the shower-head in Sen's other hand was once again pressed against his groin.
